questions.questionText: Which component is responsible for rendering graphics in a computer?
Explain the function of RAM in a computer system.
questions.correctAnswer: RAM (Random Access Memory) is used to store data temporarily for quick access by the CPU.
questions.answerShow: RAM is used for temporary data storage.

questions.questionText: What are the main differences between SSD and HDD?
questions.correctAnswer: SSD (Solid State Drive) is faster and more reliable than HDD (Hard Disk Drive), which uses spinning disks.
questions.answerShow: SSD is faster and more reliable.

questions.questionText: Describe the role of the motherboard in a computer.
questions.correctAnswer: The motherboard connects all components of the computer and allows communication between them.
